description:

450 Health

Dragonforce
Gain 25 Basic Ability Haste.

Focused Will
Dealing damage with Abilities increases your Champion's Ability and Passive damage by 3% for 6 seconds. (stacks 4 times).
name: Spear of Shojin
plaintext: Reduce damage taken from champions by a flat amount. Attack while near multiple enemy champions to increase this amount for a short time.
